definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: Assignment activities used for setup begin with a lowercase letter.
sentences.chinese: 用於設置的分配活動則以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: Finally — and I’ve never seen this before — the letter keys are all lowercase.
sentences.chinese: 最後，讓我喫驚的是，所有的按鍵都是小寫字母。

sentences.english: All variables are single character, lower-case letters.
sentences.chinese: 所有變量都是單個小寫字母。

sentences.english: Most variables and functions should start with a lower case letter.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的變量名和方法命應以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: Lowercase letters in the text are left unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 文本中的小寫字母保持不變。

sentences.english: RE SHOUTING. Using all lowercase letters looks lazy.
sentences.chinese: 都用小寫字母回讓人覺得你很懶散。

sentences.english: A strong password contains a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, along with at least one symbol.
sentences.chinese: 一個強健的密碼包含大小寫字母以及至少一個符號。

sentences.english: Using all lowercase letters looks lazy.
sentences.chinese: 都用小寫字母回讓人覺得你很懶散。

sentences.english: You can also spell the strings using mixed uppercase and lowercase letters.
sentences.chinese: 還可以用混合大小寫字母的形式拼寫字符串。

sentences.english: Use a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters.
sentences.chinese: 使用大小寫字母的組合。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-lower case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非小寫字母的字符。

sentences.english: Notice that the name of the command begins with a lowercase character.
sentences.chinese: 注意，命令名以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: CMake command is not sensitive to case.
sentences.chinese: 即指令是大小寫字母不敏感的。

sentences.english: Look at the picture in 1a. Find the big letters for the small letters.
sentences.chinese: 在活動1a的圖片中找到下列小寫字母的大寫形式。

sentences.english: Indicate each footnote in a table a superscript lowercase letter.
sentences.chinese: 每一個腳註中註明位子上標小寫字母。

definition: to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
horizontal bar to hold a door closed (made of wood or metal)/door bolt
(idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
